short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that displays a verse from the Quran

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Quran verses chrome extension. This extension that generates verses from the Quran whenever is opened. You also get a notification within time periods with verses from the Quran
